data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meini, Gianluca (2013): Two new marine flatworms (Platyhelminthes: Rhabditophora: Proseriata) of the genus Otoplana Du Plessis, 1889 from the upper Tuscany sandy shores (Italy). Zootaxa 3608 (7): 575-586, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.7.4
